subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Marlies Schild of Austria won a World Cup slalom in Zwiesel, Germany, on Friday for her fifth victory of the season in a race that Lindsey Vonn missed because of a concussion.
snippet: Marlies Schild of Austria won a World Cup slalom in Zwiesel, Germany, on Friday for her fifth victory of the season in a race that Lindsey Vonn missed because of a concussion.
